instructions: Open your phone's Settings app. Tap Security & location and then Advanced and then E ncryption & credentials . Under "Credential storage," tap Install from storage . In the top left, tap Men u . Under "Open from," tap where you saved the certificate. Tap the file. (If needed, enter the key store password. Tap OK .) Type a name for the certificate. Pick VPN and apps or Wi-Fi . Tap OK .
Open your phone's Settings app. Tap Security & location and then Advanced and then E ncryption & credentials . U nder "Credential storage," tap Clear credentials and then OK .
